import axios from"axios";// Post
export const getAllPosts=async()=>{try{const{data}=await axios.get("/api/posts");return data;}catch(error){if(error.response&&error.response.data.message)throw new Error(error.response.data.message);throw new Error(error.message);}};export const getSinglePost=async _ref=>{let{slug}=_ref;try{const{data}=await axios.get("/api/posts/".concat(slug));return data;}catch(error){if(error.response&&error.response.data.message)throw new Error(error.response.data.message);throw new Error(error.message);}};export const createPost=async _ref2=>{let{token,postData}=_ref2;try{const config={headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}};const{data}=await axios.post("/api/posts",postData,config);return data;}catch(error){if(error.response&&error.response.data.message)throw new Error(error.response.data.message);throw new Error(error.message);}};
